definitions: absence or lack of moisture or liquid

examples.text: dryness of the mouth may occur while you are taking this medicine
hand sanitizers contain ingredients that help prevent skin dryness

shortDefinitions: absence or lack of moisture or liquid

definitions: lack or absence of rainfall or humidity

examples.text: the searing heat and dryness of the Sahara
the sea retreated in periods of prolonged dryness

shortDefinitions: lack or absence of rainfall or humidity

definitions: lack of interest, excitement, or embellishment; dullness

examples.text: readers are repelled by the dryness of much of the matter
it does little to rescue the ordinary moment from dryness and tedium

shortDefinitions: lack of interest, excitement, or embellishment

definitions: the quality of being unemotional, undemonstrative, or impassive
shortDefinitions: quality of being unemotional, undemonstrative, or impassive

definitions: the quality in an alcoholic drink of not being sweet

examples.text: there's a lovely dryness to this straw-colored wine

shortDefinitions: quality of alcoholic drink not being sweet
